meta_title: ERP vs MRP: Which Does Your Plant Actually Need in 2026?
meta_description: ERP manages the business; MRP manages the materials. But without asset health, both fail. Discover the best choice for your manufacturing operations in 2026.
title: ERP vs MRP: The Maintenance-First Guide to Choosing Your Manufacturing Stack
